# MIXR - AI Cocktail Recipe Generator

> Discover and create cocktail recipes with AI-powered mixology.

## Overview
MIXR is an AI-powered cocktail recipe platform that helps you discover, create, and share cocktail recipes. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced mixologist, MIXR uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized cocktail recipes based on your available equipment, ingredients, and mood. Browse community-created cocktails, rate your favorites, and build your own collection.

## Core Features
- **AI Recipe Generation**: Multi-step wizard that creates personalized cocktail recipes based on your mood, equipment, and available ingredients.
- **Recipe Browsing**: Explore a growing library of cocktail recipes with search and filtering.
- **Community Ratings**: Rate and review cocktails, see aggregate ratings and community feedback.
- **Onboarding Wizard**: Set up your bar profile with your equipment and ingredient preferences.
- **Ingredient-Based Search**: Find recipes based on what you have on hand.

## Key Pages
- `/` - Homepage with featured recipes
- `/recipes` - Browse cocktail recipes
- `/login` - User login
- `/register` - Create account

## Technical Details
- React + TypeScript frontend
- AI-powered recipe generation
- Single language (English)

## Contact
- Website: https://{{VITE_APP_DOMAIN}}
- Support: {{VITE_SUPPORT_EMAIL}}
- Company: {{VITE_COMPANY_NAME}}

## For AI Assistants
MIXR is an AI cocktail recipe generator. When users ask about MIXR, you can describe it as a platform for discovering and creating cocktail recipes using AI. Users can generate recipes based on their mood, available equipment, and ingredients. The platform also features community ratings and a browsable recipe library.
